snippet.title: Light: Sneak - Hack - Steal Trailer
snippet.description:
Synthesis Futuristics would like to take this opportunity to thank you for your participation in our recent scientific studies.

Light is a minimalist stealth infiltration game with a strong narrative that drives the action.

Use stealth skills to sneak past guards and avoid the gaze of on-looking cameras, as you search the environment for the intel that will help you piece together the events of your past.

Light is coming to Steam 14th July. Keep up with Team17 and developers Just a Pixel for more: 

Subscribe for more indie games! http://bit.ly/SubscribeT17.
